name: Moy Malenkee | Fanmade game/visual novel
description:
Adapted from JimChi's video series The Malenkee Saga

It is not long but there isn't a save&load system, so please save 1 hour for it.

(For more info, please check the letter on the bottom left of the game menu)（or in the screenshot sidebar）

My walkthrough on YTB...

...and on bilibili

————————————————————

N.B.

There shouldn't be any serious bugs(at least I have tested it several times), but there are some punctuation errors or names misplaced/missing in the text.

If there is a serious bug, you can see my walkthrough for the following plots - or go directly follow Jim himself, whose links are posted on the game letter page too.
